jobs.title: Content Marketing / Copywriter
jobs.description:
Stronde, short for strategy on demand, is on a mission to optimise the way individuals, early stage businesses OR SMEs seek and get strategic advice online. Think about us as the future Airbnb of the consulting world. 

We had been running for 3 years now, as a digital strategy consultancy and building a great product in the side-lines and we need a Content Marketing / Copywriter to join our team to work on all things content. 

Who you are?
	1. First-rate communicate with excellent verbal and writing skills
	2. You love writing and always focus on the reader to come up with compelling copy that can drive conversions.
	3. Self-starter who can coordinate with multiple stakeholders in a professional manner
	4. Approachable human-being
	5. Good understanding of the digital marketing landscape
	6. Creative thinker with great interpersonal skills
	7. Strong planning and organisation skills
	8. You want to build a career in the copywriting scene


Must haves:
	• 3+ years’ experience creating content for a start-up, tech OR B2B company
	• Good knowledge of the digital marketing scene
	• Experience editing and writing conversion-driven copy
	• Based in London


What you'll do
	• Working on and managing the content marketing plan
	• Creating and editing copy for our upcoming website, blogs and social media (LinkedIn + Facebook) posts
	• Working closely with the product team to come up with new content ideas to grow our knowledge base
	• Research promotion and engagement ideas
	• Finding relevant imagery or videos to publish alongside digital content (blog, email, website)
	• Work on our consultancy side on review and edits of client's marketing copy
	• Make job descriptions, like these, more compelling.

Benefits
	• Start-up environment
	• Occasional working from home days
	• Be part of something great
	• Breakfast Mondays
	• Cake Wednesdays
